Electronics Collection Programs are Arranged at the Fayette County Fairgrounds a Few Times Annually. Call the Fayette County Recycling Hotline for Details.

Sharps are correctly disposed of in the state of PA by placing them into a solid plastic container with a lid. Once full, screw the lid on tightly and add tape for extra security. Write sharps on the container, and dispose with regular waste.
